plot: When a passionate filmmaker sets out to make an Oscar-worthy movie about "the true paternity of Abraham Lincoln," he is forced by the studio to cast a teen pop star he despises. Hatred soon...
title: The Genesis of Lincoln
plot_es: When a passionate filmmaker sets out to make an Oscar-worthy movie about "the true paternity of Abraham Lincoln," he is forced by the studio to cast a teen pop star he despises. Hatred soon...
